title: Maharani Polki Haaram: An Ode to Regal Elegance
materials: Uncut Polki Diamonds (పొల్కీ వజ్రాలు) - High Clarity
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases the timeless allure of uncut Polki diamonds. Each Polki is meticulously set in a closed setting (కంఠాభరణం) to enhance its natural brilliance. The design features a cascading floral motif, culminating in a central pendant adorned with smaller Polkis and subtle rosé accent diamonds to make this more unique. The piece exemplifies the traditional 'Jadau' craftsmanship technique originating from Rajasthan, adapted beautifully by Hyderabad's finest artisans. Intricate detailing and the classic U-shaped design elevate this piece to a true work of art. There is a slight antique finish too.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as Muhurtham (ముహూర్తం)
or any event where you wish to make a statement of timeless elegance.
description: This Polki Haaram is a testament to the enduring legacy of Indian jewelry artistry. It’s not just a necklace; it's an heirloom piece to be treasured for generations. The high-quality Polki diamonds radiate a captivating glow, while the Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting sheen. Its robust design guarantees durability, while its elegant silhouette makes it a versatile addition to any fine jewelry collection. The use of uncut diamonds adds a unique, organic beauty that stands apart from modern cut diamonds.
